attributes.action: Redebate and revote on allowing 3,000 unsupervised Syrian children in to the UK
attributes.background: Recently, the government scraped plans to allow 3,000 unsupervised Syrian immigrants into the UK. However, I am calling for the government to have a redebate and revote. If you agree with me, please take a few minutes to sign this petition, we must unite together and help these innocent children!
